## R Markdown

This is a test for CDM documentation dynamically created from the specification excel file

```{r docLoop, include=TRUE, eval=TRUE, echo=FALSE}
cdmSpecs <- readxl::read_excel("S:/Git/Github/DDLgeneratr_OHDSI/docs/OMOP CDMv5.3.1 Specs v0.1.xlsx", sheet = "FIELD LEVEL")
tableSpecs <- readxl::read_excel("S:/Git/Github/DDLgeneratr_OHDSI/docs/OMOP CDMv5.3.1 Specs v0.1.xlsx", sheet = "TABLE LEVEL")
tables <- tableSpecs$CDM_TABLE

cdmSpecsClean <- cdmSpecs %>%
  dplyr::select(`CDM Table` = CDM_TABLE,
                `CDM Field` = CDM_FIELD,
                `User Guide` = USER_GUIDANCE,
                `ETL Conventions` = ETL_CONVENTIONS,
                `Datatype` = CDM_DATATYPE,
                `Is Required` = IS_REQUIRED,
                `Is Primary Key` = IS_PRIMARY_KEY,
                `Is Foreign Key (FK)` = IS_FOREIGN_KEY,
                `FK Table` = FK_TABLE,
                `FK Domain` = FK_DOMAIN,
                `FK Class` = FK_CLASS
                )

for(tb in tables) {
  cat("##", tb)
  
  loopTable <- subset(cdmSpecsClean, `CDM Table` == tb)
 print(kable(x = loopTable, align = "l", row.names = FALSE) %>% kable_styling())
  
  }



```
